H0.text: It uses renewable natural resources is one of the major advantages of using hydroelectric power.

H1.text: It is easily generated in most big cities is one of the major advantages of using hydroelectric power.

H2.text: It can be generated from any area on Earth is one of the major advantages of using hydroelectric power.

H3.text: It does not require special buildings or equipment, which is one of the major advantages of using hydroelectric power.

A4.text: Hydropower supplies 15% of the world's electricity, almost 4,210 TWh in 2023, which is more than all other renewable sources combined and also more than nuclear power.

A5.text: Hydroelectricity plays a leading role in countries like Brazil, Norway and China, but there are geographical limits and environmental issues.
